welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bawana, India – a city known for its rich culture, delicious food, and warm hospitality. Get ready to immerse yourself in its charm and discover all that this vibrant city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and busiest terminal at Indira Gandhi International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newly constructed terminal at Indira Gandhi International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Indira Gandhi International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
